meanings.definition: a group of artists or writers who advocate extreme or radical ideas
meanings.sent1: The ultraists gathered to discuss their avant-garde creations.
meanings.sent2: Many famous poets were part of the ultraists movement.
meanings.sent3: The ultraists decided to paint the town red, quite literally.
meanings.sent4: Their artwork was like a storm, bold and unapologetic, just like the ultraists themselves.
meanings.sent5: The ultraists' ideas were like fireworks, bursting with creativity and passion.

meanings.definition: individuals who support or promote extreme political or social views
meanings.sent1: Some ultraists believe in drastic changes to society.
meanings.sent2: The ultraists' speeches often sparked heated debates.
meanings.sent3: The ultraists' protest was so extreme, they brought a giant rubber duck as a mascot.
meanings.sent4: Their views were like a wildfire, spreading quickly and fiercely, just like the ultraists.
meanings.sent5: The ultraists' influence was like a tidal wave, unstoppable and overwhelming.
